comments.text: Karnataka govt announces scrapping of NEP, plans to formulate state-specific education policy
Constitution is safe when Congress gets to have it their way.
This news is sad in so many ways. They want fight.
வாழ்த்துகள். யாருக்கு எந்த படிப்பு தேவையோ அதை கோடு. அதைவிட்டு திணிக்காதே!!! திணித்தால் வாந்திதான் வரும்.
If NEP is  scrapped then Karnataka students will have no scope in rest of India.  Politicians  must be careful.
Still sex education will always be off the table as it is not our sanskriti to teach that. Let us just reproduce more though.
